articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Denounces S. Korean Regime for Moving to Disband Unified Progressive Party
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Denounces S. Korean Regime for Moving to Disband Unified Progressive Party
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative group urged the puppet Ministry of Justice to form a "team of experts to take measures against political parties and organizations violating constitution" and staged the farce of making legal examination for the disorganization of the Unified Progressive Party. It decided to request the puppet constitutional court to try the case and is inviting lawyers for the trial.
					The coteries of the "Saenuri Party" at a state inspection of the "National Assembly" set the disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party as an issue top on agenda and are fanning up hysteria, talking about "enemy of liberal democracy".
					
					The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in its information bulletin No. 1048 on Thursday said the south Korean puppet conservative group's moves for the disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party are a shocking fascist rowdyism unprecedented in history.
					
					The group calls for disbanding the Unified Progressive Party, linking it with the DPRK. This is an unpardonable provocation and challenge to the DPRK, the information bulletin said, and went on:
					
					The group is talking about "political party following the north" and "plotted rebellion". This is illogical sophism that can be made only by those obsessed by confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					It is quite natural that the south Koreans of all social standings are denouncing the group's moves for the disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party as "an act violating democracy", "neo-fascist act" and "an act of raising wind of McCarthyism".
					
					The group is also trying to disorganize the Teachers Union, calling it the "heart of forces following the north" and "inside enemy". It even seeks to shut down Jaju Minbo, a progressive internet paper.
					
					Its suppression is aimed to remove the core of the progressive forces in south Korea, shrink all the forces standing for reunification through alliance with the north and forces for democracy and reform and lay a springboard for its long-term stay in power.
					
					The prevailing situation clearly proves that the puppet group is a horde of hideous fascist hooligans and confrontational maniacs who put the past military dictators into the shade.

articles.title: Greetings to Zambian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zambian President
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Michael Chilufya Sata, president of Zambia, on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of its independence.
					Kim expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries which have long history and tradition would steadily grow strong, wishing the president and government of Zambia greater success in the work for the prosperity of the country and well-being of its people.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark Day of UN
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark Day of UN
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Ghulam M. Isaczai, U.N. resident coordinator and resident representative of the United Nations Development Programme here, gave a reception at Yanggakdo International Hotel on Oct. 24 to mark the Day of the UN.
					Present at the reception on invitation were Pak Kil Yon, vice-foreign minister, officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys here.
					
					On hand were representatives of international bodies here.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests including a delegation of the All-China Journalists Association led by Liu Ying, director of the International Department of the Workers' Daily, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Thursday.
					They paid high tribute to their statues.
					
					They entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them in the humblest reverence.
					
					They went round the halls where orders they received are on display and the halls that house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the New Socialist Party of Japan headed by Eiko Tomiyama, vice-president of its Central Executive Committee, left here for home on Thursday.

articles.title: Outdoor Wading Pool at Munsu Water Park in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Outdoor Wading Pool at Munsu Water Park in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Munsu Water Park in Pyongyang, a world-leading center for people's recreation, started its operation some time ago.
					The park was built on the initiative of supreme leader Kim Jong Un and under his meticulous guidance.
					
					What catches the visitors' eyes in the park is the outdoor wading pool furnished with various facilities and apparatuses.
					
					The outdoor wading pool has dive slide, coaster-style slide, wavy slide, tube slide, etc. 
					
					It also boasts of 10-odd water tanks different in size and use, including tanks for seawater, surge, etc.
					
					Spectacular in the pool is a small water park for children, which looks like a fairy-tale park.
					
					The park is arranged with artificial falls and rocky mountain with a cave reminding one of Mts. Myohyang and Kumgang and Ryongmun Cavern, where sculptures of such animals as turtle and crocodile are displayed. 
					
					Seen also in the Munsu Water Park are facilities for outdoor sports.
					
					At one of those water tanks, Jang Paek Hyang, a citizen living in the Central District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					I can hardly find appropriate words to express my joy and happiness in the water park. And I am reluctant to leave here.
					
					We are very grateful to the Workers' Party of Korea for having provided the people with the best water park.

articles.title: Information Scientific and Technological Achievements Exhibition Closes
articles.content:
Information Scientific and Technological Achievements Exhibition Closes
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The 5th national exhibition of information scientific and technological achievements of students was closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Thursday.
					More than 700 inventions and IT products were highly appreciated for their scientific and technical and economic values and big profits.
					
					Present at the ceremony were officials concerned, youth league officials and students.
					
					Results of the examination were announced by the jury at the ceremony.
					
					Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology among universities and Haeju College of Medicine among colleges won the titles.
					
					Meanwhile, North Hamgyong Province took the special grade and South Hamgyong Province the first place in the provincial socialist emulation between students' groups for study of science from across the country.

articles.title: Joint Art Performance Touches Hearts of People in DPRK
articles.content:
Joint Art Performance Touches Hearts of People in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea", a joint performance of the Moranbong Band and the State Merited Chorus in the DPRK, was given in celebration of the 68th WPK anniversary, before being televised from October 17 to 20.
					The performance created a sensation among the audience and viewers for its high ideological and artistic plane.
					
					Kim Jae Duk, a department director of the Ministry of Railways, told KCNA:
					
					The performance grasped the hearts of the audience, with the prologue "We Sing of the Party" and a female chorus "Ode to the Motherland".
					
					The songs well show the feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who devoted all their life to turning the DPRK into a country where its people's ideals are translated into reality, and the Korean people's ardent reverence for the WPK that takes warm care of them while training them to be heroes of the era.
					
					I was deeply touched by light music and serial songs "O Mother Party which Protected My Destiny" as it well represented the people's profound gratitude to the WPK for having built a socialist flower garden with loving care on this land.
					
					Kim Un Suk, a woman living in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province, said that the performance made her recall with deep emotion the days when the Party and the people have advanced victoriously in a harmonious whole.
					
					Sok Ran Hui, a teacher of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, said:
					
					Singers of the Moranbong Band made atmosphere of the performance more cheerful with dance-accompanied songs "Dash toward Future" and "Campfire, Flare Up", displaying charming rhythmic movements.
					
					Instrumentalists of the band showed high artistic quality with passionate ensemble in string quartet "It Is October".
					
					What was impressive was male chorus "Our Future Is Bright" and "Let's Defend Socialism" performed in a fresh and peculiar style by the State Merited Chorus, which well represented the fact that victory and glory are always in store for the DPRK guided by the great party.
					
					Orchestra and male chorus "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms" fully displayed the mettle and dignity of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army holding fast to the flag of the WPK.

articles.title: Korean Silk Wins Popularity among Foreigners
articles.content:
Korean Silk Wins Popularity among Foreigners
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- From olden times, Korea's silk has been widely known to the world.
					Korea began to produce quality silks, along with hemp and ramie fabrics, already in the late primitive ages. This fact was proven by earthenware depicting silkworm from the relics dating back to the Neolithic and Bronze ages, discovered in Pongsan County, North Hwanghae Province.
					
					Its silk-weaving technique was spread even to Japan in the period of the Three Kingdoms in Korea.  According to a Japanese history book, Korean technicians had been active in Japan from the 4th-5th centuries to the 7th century to teach how to produce silk.
					
					The silk-producing technique further developed, with silk fabrics increased in number of varieties, in the period of Koryo Kingdom (918-1392). And the fabrics was exported even to the Middle and Near East for its good quality and widely known to the world as "Koryo Silk".
					
					There appeared a large number of silk production bases and areas of mulberry during the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910). 
					
					The localities of Korea noted for silk production are Nyongbyon in North Phyongan Province, Songchon in South Phyongan Province, Kumya, Jongphyong, Kowon, Pukchong and Tanchon in South Hamgyong Province, Kilju and Myongchon in North Hamgyong Province, Cholwon in Kangwon Province, Suan in North Hwanghae Province, etc.
					
					Among the famous silk fabrics, there are Yaksandan and Kuryongdan silks named by President Kim Il Sung. Yaksandan, patterned with azalea, was named after Yaksandongdae, a well-known area in Nyongbyon, and Kuryongdan the River Kuryong skirting Yaksandongdae.
					
					These kinds of silk cloth are produced at the Nyongbyon Silk Mill, a famous silk producer in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					The modernly-equipped mill also turns out various kinds of silk fabrics such as polychromatic silk, brocade and satin, with silk thread produced at the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill and rayon yarn at the Chongjin Chemical Fibre Mill as main raw materials.
					
					The Korean silk is still very popular among foreigners as well as local people.
					
					The Pyongyang Silk Shop, located in Mansudae Street in the capital city of the DPRK, serves many silk products including chima (skirt) and jogori (coat) and bed suites.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's "Confidence-building Process on Korean Peninsula"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's "Confidence-building Process on Korean Peninsula"
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday runs a commentator's article on the lapse of 8 months since Park Geun Hye took office, touting "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" as her policy towards the north. 
					The article says:
					
					The "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" is, in a nutshell, a ridiculous watchword aimed to lead the north to changes and induce it to dismantle its nukes under the signboard of "confidence" and conduct "economic cooperation" if it abandons its nuclear program and brings about a system change. 
					
					This watchword is, in essence, nothing different from "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars," a policy of confrontation with the DPRK pursued by traitor Lee Myung Bak as it is designed to realize her wild ambition for invading the north in collusion with outside forces. 
					
					It may be called a very cunning and sinister confrontation and anti-reunification policy veiled with the high-sounding word of "confidence".
					
					The "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" is a treacherous policy for fostering distrust and hostility between the north and the south and seeking confrontation with fellow countrymen. It is a policy of a war against the DPRK as it is aimed to force it to unilaterally dismantle its nukes and disarm it and realize her scenario for invasion of it. 
					
					As soon as Park came to power, she revealed her true colors as a confrontation maniac, claiming that the "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" was not the "policy of appeasement" but the one "based on military deterrence supported by the south Korea-U.S. alliance" and that "south Korea would strongly counter the north's provocation through south Korea-U.S. cooperation."
					
					Moreover, south Korea staged DPRK-targeted madcap war exercises of various forms including Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian with the U.S.
					
					The south Korean puppet conservative group derailed the hard-won talks between authorities of the north and the south, blustering "south Korea would not have dialogue to be pulled by the north" and "it would stick to its principle". Park drove the Kaesong Industrial Zone into a crisis, vociferating about "hostage incident" and "operation of commando unit of the U.S. forces," something her predecessor dared not do. 
					
					It is the present regime in south Korea which staged a ridiculous farce of opening even the minutes of the north-south summit to public in a desperate bid to mar its historic significance. It is again the regime that deleted all the points related to the October 4 declaration from "the second principal plan for the development of south-north relations". 
					
					Lee Myung Bak begged the U.S. for "extended deterrence" which assures the provision of U.S. nuclear umbrella. Not to lag behind him, Park Geun Hye adopted the "tailored deterrence strategy" for preemptive attack on the north by mobilizing even a nuclear force in the U.S. mainland and went the lengths of fully joining in the establishment of the U.S. missile defense system.
					
					Since Park came to power, the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula has reached its height.
					
					Park and her group urge the DPRK to dismantle its nukes and cancel its new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force under the pretext of "confidence-building". Lurking behind this is a sinister intention to disarm the DPRK and achieve their goal of aggression in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					The above-said watchword is an anti-reunification policy as it totally denies the mending of the north-south relations and seeks confrontation of the social systems. 
					
					Traitor Lee Myung Bak pursued a "waiting strategy" obsessed with a daydream of "contingency" in the north. But Park Geun Hye went one step ahead to cry out for "leading the north to changes, not just waiting for them."
					
					The newly adopted "principal plan for the development of south- north relations" singles out "the process of leading the north to changes" as a key principle and orientation and clarifies the will to strengthen cooperation in the campaign to pressurize the DPRK to implement it. 
					
					Their talk about "changes" is nothing but pressure upon the DPRK to stop following the road of independence, Songun and socialism but introduce corrupt American style capitalism just as they did. It is an intolerable insult and vicious provocation to the people of the DPRK who regard the dignity of the supreme leadership and the social system as their own life and soul. 
					
					It is none other than the south Korean authorities who should take a right option and opt for changes. 
					
					They should make a major policy switchover as they desperately insist on extending the transfer of the OPECON (wartime operation control) which they had been supposed to take over from the U.S. and are working hard to revive "Yusin" dictatorship enforced decades ago.
					
					All facts go to prove that the above-said watchword is nothing but an extremely sinister scenario as it is not aimed at building confidence and improving the north-south relations but at fostering distrust, confrontation and war. 
					
					The U.S. is behind the "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula". 
					
					It is the U.S. scenario for invading the north it provided to the south Korean puppet forces in a bid to introduce into the Korean Peninsula the "Helsinki process" which succeeded in bringing down socialist countries. It is a product of the U.S. policy of aggression toward Korea and Asian strategy from A to Z.
					
					The U.S. instigated south Korea to advocate the "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" as a new doctrine for aggression to maintain the pro-U.S. conservative regime in south Korea and use the south Korean puppet forces as a cat's paw in the moves to put the whole Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia under its control. 
					
					It is nothing but an empty talk and hypocrisy for the south Korean authorities to vociferate about "confidence" while running amuck to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and launch a war against the north in collusion with outside forces.
					
					The Park Geun Hye group, in particular, has no face to talk about "confidence" as it has malignantly slandered the dignity of the supreme leadership and the social system in the DPRK which its service personnel and people regard as dearer than their own life. 
					
					What the Korean nation wants is not such play of words as "confidence-building process" but the earliest possible implementation of the historic north-south declarations. 
					
					The implementation of the joint declarations guarantees confidence, improved relations, peace on the Korean Peninsula and reunification and prosperity of the nation. 
					
					Now is the time for the Park group to give up its anachronistic sycophancy toward the U.S., take a right option and bring about  changes in the idea of "by our nation itself". 
					
					If she truly wants confidence-building and improved relations between the north and the south, she should roll back the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen, stop the war moves and opt for implementing the north-south joint declarations. 
					
					The DPRK will as ever join hands with anyone who hopes for national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification, not asking about one's past. 
					
					Park Geun Hye would be well advised to pay heed to the DPRK's advise and call with good reason, though belatedly.

articles.title: South Korean Regime Condemned for Its Illegal Surveillance over Students
articles.content:
South Korean Regime Condemned for Its Illegal Surveillance over Students
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the puppet  Seoul City Education Office conducted an illegal surveillance over the students who took part in the candlelight meetings to denounce the Intelligence Service's  interference in the presidential election.
					A lawmaker from an opposition party disclosed this on Monday.
					
					According to him, the education office, much upset by the publication of a declaration on the situation by the students in protest against the IS's illegal interference in the election in July last, secretly planted watchers among the participants in the candlelight meetings in a bid to grasp their tendency.
					
					Those who disguised themselves as participants informed the superintendent of education of Seoul City of the turnout, the accounts of the speeches made, literature, etc.
					
					The education office invited them to wining and dining to project them.
					
					This was reportedly done at the direct instruction of the superintendent of education of Seoul City.
					
					It was also disclosed that the education office in Inchon City, investigating those students in most schools in Inchon area in September who took part in the meeting to issue a declaration on the situation, threatened them with expulsion and disciplinary actions and gathered the information related to the movement for issuing the declaration on the situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Distortion of History under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Distortion of History under Fire
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on Tuesday editorially denounced the puppet group for its moves to have textbooks rewritten to distort history.
					The editorial said:
					
					The puppet Ministry of Education instructed publishing houses to modify and supplement 829 descriptions in eight kinds of history textbooks for higher schools on October 21.
					
					These textbooks were screened by the puppet Committee for Compiling National History in August and they are peppered with the contents openly beautifying the pro-Japanese acts and dictatorship of Syngman Rhee and Park Chung-Hee.
					
					As soon as the protest was voiced by people of various circles as regards the screening by the said committee, the puppet ministry declared that it would pick up misinformation and wrong descriptions and expressions.
					
					So the instruction was issued to modify and supplement the textbooks this time but it included nothing related to the successive dictators.
					
					Conveying this fact, the editorial held that if history is distorted and even the contents of the textbooks are altered for a political purpose, it is impossible to prevent the repetition of conflicting assertions about history.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations File Suit in Prosecution against Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations File Suit in Prosecution against Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Committee for Restoring Four Large Rivers and the Committee for Surveying Four Large Rivers in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday and filed a suit in the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office against traitor Lee Myung Bak for conducting the project to improve four large rivers, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					The organizations condemned Lee for deceiving the people by terming the construction of a large canal the project to improve four large rivers, and pushing ahead with it and causing huge losses through the illegal implementation of the budget.
					
					They called for punishing Lee and 57 persons who pressed ahead with the project at his instruction on behalf of the people.

articles.title: Suppression of Progressive Paper Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Progressive Paper Denounced in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Journalists of the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo on Oct. 21 released an appeal calling for frustrating the moves of the south Korean authorities to shut down the paper. 
					The appeal said that a lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party" recently mentioned discontinuing the progressive paper Jaju Minbo amid the suppression of the paper becoming harsher. The conservative forces bereft of reason have joined it all at once, availing themselves of the opportunity, it added. 
					
					Meanwhile, the Seoul Metropolitan authorities threatened that they will open a hearing to decide whether to close the paper or not, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					Jaju Minbo has so far made objective reports about the north to check the deterioration of the south-north relations and achieve peaceful reunification by implementing the south-north joint declaration and build a prosperous reunified country. 
					
					Nevertheless, the authorities try to shut down the legal paper. It is an action aimed to violate democracy. 
					
					If the progressive paper is shut down, only coarse invectives slandering the fellow countrymen will be carried in the press and it will become impossible to check the danger of war mounting toward a crucial phase. 
					
					The closure of Jaju Minbo will lead to discontinuance of other progressive media organs.
					
					The appeal called upon all the people to actively turn out in the moves to block this.

articles.title: Hospital Unionists Wage General Strike
articles.content:
Hospital Unionists Wage General Strike
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Trade Union of the Hospital of Seoul National University entered a general strike on Wednesday, according to south Korean CBS.
					The organization reacted to the authorities of the hospital who refused to meet its demands such as wage hike of workers and improvement of their conditions by launching a strike.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Observed by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Observed by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Flag representing the people's destiny" on its website on October 17 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The article said:
					
					The song "Fly High, Our Party Flag" is popular among the Korean people.
					
					The song represents well the fact that the WPK has made a long journey of revolution, flying the party flag symbolic of the destiny of the people.
					
					The WPK has done everything possible for the people, positively putting forward them for a long period since its founding.
					
					There arrived a new era of history in which the popular masses emerged as a master of society and their destiny though they had been regarded as a target of oppression and rule in the past, and new politics centered on them has been pursued thanks to the WPK.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a mother party serving the people, the article said. 
					
					Introducing his politics of love for the people, the article went on:
					
					The flag of the WPK fully retains its original color, remaining unshaken despite all sorts of trials of history.
					
					The flag of the WPK fluttered higher when the red flags were lowered in various socialist countries late in the 20th century and the destiny of the people was infringed upon. 
					
					Today the flag of the WPK which has protected the destiny of the people for several decades is fluttering higher thanks to Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Anniversary of DIU Marked in Guinea, India
articles.content:
Anniversary of DIU Marked in Guinea, India
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A lecture and film shows took place in Guinea and India on October 14 and 17 to mark the 87th anniversary of the founding of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					Present there were public figures of all social standings and masses of relevant countries.
					
					The participants watched Korean films including "Monument to Party Founding" and "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					The dean of the Fine Arts Faculty of the Guinean Art College said:
					
					The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) has its roots in the DIU.
					
					The programme of the DIU has become the basis of the programme of the WPK and the firm guidelines of the party-building and activities.
					
					The WPK is successfully carrying forward the tradition of the single-minded unity pioneered by the DIU.
					
					It calls on all the people to turn out in the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					The WPK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un will only emerge victorious amid the support and trust of the people.
					
					The chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK to be a mother party which takes full responsibility for the people's destiny and takes care of them.

articles.title: Special Bulletin on Korean People's Day of Victory in War Issued in Britain
articles.content:
Special Bulletin on Korean People's Day of Victory in War Issued in Britain
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association jointly issued a special bulletin "Korean People Celebrate 60th Anniversary of Victory in Fatherland Liberation War". 
					The bulletin edited news of the Korean people's grand celebration of the diamond jubilee of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War, impressions of the DPRK given by personages of political parties who took part in the celebrations and information about the struggle of the British people against aggression by the U.S. and British imperialists during the war.
					
					The bulletin said in its preface:
					
					The victory of the Korean people in the last Fatherland Liberation War was the victory of the Juche-oriented military idea and outstanding strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and the victory of the indomitable mental power of the army and people of the DPRK closely united around the party and the leader. 
					
					In the Korean war the U.S. imperialists suffered a heavy defeat, the first of its kind in the 100 odd year-long history of its wars of aggression and the DPRK became a hero country and its army and people were known as heroic army and people in the world. 
					
					During the Korean war the progressive forces in Britain waged a protest movement against the UK's participation in the war. 
					
					Many representatives of progressive political parties and organizations in the world joined the Korean people in celebrating the diamond jubilee of the war victory, a heavy blow to the U.S. and its allies.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Zambia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Zambia
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 24 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Zambia Michael Chilufya Sata con motivo del 49o aniversario de la independencia de este pais africano.
					Convencido de que seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion de larga historia y tradicion entre ambos paises, el remitente deseo mayores exitos en la labor del destinatario y el gobierno de Zambia por la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia a autoridades surcoreanas en su  intencion de disolver PPU
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia a autoridades surcoreanas en su  intencion de disolver PPU
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, la banda de los conservadores del Sur de Corea instigo al Ministerio de Justicia para organizar un "equipo especializado para tratar los partidos politicos y entidades inconstitucionales" y examina legalmente el tema de disolucion del Partido Progresista Unido. Para este fin solicito el juicio a la Corte Constitucional titere y agrupa hasta a los abogados.
					Por otra parte, los compinches del "Partido Saenuri" presentaron en la reunion de inspeccion parlamentaria como agenda principal la disolucion del PPU calificandolo de "enemigo de la democracia libre".
					
					En su informacion no.1048 publicada el dia 24, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria lo acuso de violacion fascista sin precedente que consterna a todo el mundo y continuo:
					
					La intencion de la banda surcoreana de disolver el Partido Progresista Unido relacionandolo con la RPDC, es una imperdonable provocacion y desafio.
					
					Las palabras "partido pro-Norte (de Corea)" y "conspiracion para una rebelion" lanzadas por la banda surcoreana son ilogicas y sofisterias de los enloquecidos en la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Es natural que los distintos estratos del Sur de Corea condenen las maniobras de la banda titere como "acto de destruccion de la democracia", "neofascismo", "ola de McCarthyism".
					
					La banda trata de disolver tambien el Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes calificandolo de "corazon de las fuerzas pro-Norte" y "enemigo interior", y cerrar el progresista periodico online surcoreano Jaju Minbo.
					
					Las maniobras represivas de la banda conservadora son para erradicar en el Sur de Corea la raiz de las fuerzas progresistas y preparar el cimiento necesario a su gobernacion perenne al acobardar a todas las fuerzas de reunificacion en alianza con el Norte y por la  democracia y la reforma.
					
					La situacion creada en el Sur de Corea demuestra claramente que los titeres surcoreanos son gangsteres fascistas y maniacos conflictivos que enrojecen hasta a los antecedentes dictadores militares.

articles.title: Belicistas surcoreanos anuncian inicio de simulacro militar
articles.content:
Belicistas surcoreanos anuncian inicio de simulacro militar
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- Segun la cadena surcoreana KBS, los belicistas surcoreanos anunciaron que desplegarian durante 9 dias desde el 24 el entrenamiento "Hoguk" encaminado a elevar la capacidad de operacion conjunta entre diversas tropas frente a la "provocacion local del Norte (de Corea)".
					Durante el periodo de simulacro, tratan de realizar el entrenamiento provocativo inclusive el ejercicio de penetracion a las costeras de la parte Norte y la defensa de las islas del noroeste.
					
					Ya quedo revelado ya el caracter provocativo de agresion al Norte del entrenamiento "Hoguk".
					
					El incidente de canonazos artilleros en la isla Yonphyong, que llevo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de la guerra, tambien se produjo durante el tiempo de simulacro "Hoguk" del ano 2010.
					
					Entonces, los titeres se enfrascaron al simulacro provocativo en la isla citada bajo el rotulo de la defensa de islas del noroeste y lanzaron proyectiles hacia aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC, pero fueron castigados por la fuerte contramedida de la parte nortena.
					
					El proceder belicoso de los compinches de la capa militar titere solamente revelara su naturaleza como responsable de la crisis de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Seda de Corea
articles.content:
Seda de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- La seda de Corea es uno de los generos de seda conocido ampliamente desde anos remotos en el mundo.
					Ya en la ultima etapa de la edad primitiva y la antigua, se produjeron muchas sedas cualitativas junto con el canamo y el ramio.
					
					En los vestigios de la era neolitica y la Edad de Bronce, inclusive las ruinas de la comuna de Jithap del distrito de Pongsan de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, se descubrieron las vasijas de barro que describieron los gusanos de sede, lo cual deja conocer que desde finales de la edad primitiva comenzo a producirse la seda.
					
					En la epoca de Tres Reinos, la tecnica de tejer de seda se propago hasta Japon.
					
					Un libro de historia de Japon, da a conocer que desde los siglos IV y V hasta el siglo VII los tejedores coreanos de seda fueron a Japon para divulgar la tecnica de tejer y asi comenzo en pais isla la produccion de seda.
					
					En el periodo de Coryo (918-1392), se desarrollo mas la tecnica de produccion de seda y se aumentaron sus generos.
					
					Por su elevada calidad, la seda se exporto hasta el Medio y Cercano Oriente y fue reconocida en el mundo como "seda de Coryo".
					
					En el periodo de la dinastia feudal de Joson (1392-1910), se construyeron las bases productoras de seda y se plantaron en gran  medida los morales. 
					
					Las localidades famosas en la produccion de seda son: Nyongbyon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Songchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, Kumya, Jongphyong, Kowon, Pukchong y Tanchon de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kilju y Myongchon de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Cholwon de la provincia de Kangwon, Suan de Hwanghae del Norte, etc.
					
					Entre las telas de seda renombradas hay "Yaksandan" y "Kuryongdan", bautizadas personalmente por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Tales sedas se producen en la Fabrica Textil de Seda de Nyongbyon, renombrada base de produccion de seda de Corea.
					
					La fabrica, dotada de modernas instalaciones mecanicas, produce diversos generos de seda al emplear como su materia prima principal la fibra de seda de la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang y el hilo de rayon de la Fabrica de Fibras Quimicas de Chongjin.
					
					Tambien hoy en dia, la seda de Corea gana la gran reputacion entre los extranjeros.
					
					La Tienda de Sedas de Pyongyang, situada en la capitalina avenida de Mansudae, se venden los productos hechos con seda, incluyendo chima y jogori, la manta acolchada y almohada, etc.
